modShortDescription: Player Vending Machines never were useful. At least, not for Claymore. If we play: We play together. So why no simple change to sell items at home?
modDescription:
Player Vending Machines never were useful. At least, not for Claymore. If we play: We play together. So he thought: Why no simple change to sell items at home? Player Vending Machines are now Selling Machines only. They’ll reset each day and have the same rules (better barter & selling) like if you sell something to a real [trader](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/). You still have to buy the machines from a trader. But he think, they’re now worth buying – just for the convenience.

Compatibility: A18+

**Changelog**  
\-Machines got no full reset after each day. Fixed.

[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/670qz6akmwungmv/Claymore_Selling_Machines.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
